simplify.privacy.fieldtypes.help: Complete field types can be excluded from translation.
simplify.privacy.fieldtypes.label: Included Field Types
simplify.privacy.masking.emails.help: Emails can be replaced with placeholders before the API call and restored after translation. Supported formats: Standard RFC 5322
simplify.privacy.masking.emails.label: Mask emails
simplify.privacy.masking.phones.help: Phone numbers can be replaced with placeholders before the API call and restored after translation. Supported formats: Landline, Mobile, International (with/without spaces/hyphens)
simplify.privacy.masking.phones.label: Mask phone numbers
simplify.privacy.optout.fields.help: Field names like MetaKeywords or wildcards such as meta* can be specified. Capitalization is flexible.
simplify.privacy.optout.fields.label: Excluded Field Names
simplify.privacy.optout.templates.help: Pages based on these templates will not be translated.
simplify.privacy.optout.templates.label: Excluded Templates
simplify.project.help: Project-specific instructions provide the AI with context about the project so translations match the right tone. Recommended information includes project/product, target audience, form of address, tone (formal/casual/professional), and any special considerations for the right translation style. Settings defined here are active across all language variants.
simplify.project.label: Project-specific Instructions
simplify.prompt.help: The system prompt defines the basic task and behavior of the AI for this language variant.
